Package com.mc.controller

package com.mc.controller
  • Class
    Description
    AddAppointmentController
    Controller class for adding appointments.
    AddCustomerController
    AddCustomerController is a JavaFX controller responsible for handling the process of creating a new customer.
    BaseAppointmentController
    Abstract base class for appointment controllers, providing common functionality and fields for AddAppointmentController and ModifyAppointmentController.
    BaseCustomerController
    Abstract BaseCustomerController class provides common functionalities for the AddCustomerController and the ModifyCustomerController.
    CustomerMenuController
    A controller class for managing the customer menu UI.
    LoginScreenController
    Controller class for the LoginScreen scene.
    MainMenuController
    Controller class for the MainMenu scene.
    ModifyAppointmentController
    Controller for the Modify Appointment view.
    ModifyCustomerController
    Controller for the Modify Customer view.
    ReportMenuController
    Controller class that handles actions and interactions in the Report Menu screen.
    SharedControllerInterface
    Provides a method signature for setting the current user in controllers that implement this interface.
